txt.en: Blackhorn and other mountain rams can be found in Ered Mithrin.\n\nYou should defeat rams.
A bounty notice asks you to seek out Blackhorn, a maddened wild beast in Ered Mithrin.
You have defeated Blackhorn and assisted the expedition.

The bounty notice is written in a messy and hasty scrawl. It reads:

'He stood atop a great cliff, and I knew he spied me from afar. Blackhorn, mightiest of the rams that rule the Ered Mithrin. Stalked me for days, he did; I can still hear the sound of his hooves on the stone behind me! Clop. Clop. Clop! When will it end?

'I offer a reward to any who can rid these mountains of Blackhorn and the rest of his kin. I never want to hear the sound of hooves on stone ever again! Clop! Clop! Clop!'
